translations: n.初进社交界的人；初次登台的人

phrs.translation: 初次登台的人, 初次上场的运动员
线上首次亮相者, 在线上模式中完成首场比赛

sentences.sentence: Hodgson also confirmed debutant Paul Konchesky was substituted purely as a precaution.
sentences.translation: 霍奇森同时确认，首次亮相的孔切斯基被换下，纯粹是作为预防措施。

sentences.sentence: Debutant goalkeeper, 15 years old Wales schoolboy international Rhys Taylor, saves a penalty.
sentences.translation: 德布·坦特队来自威尔士的年仅15岁的国际守门员瑞斯·泰勒扑出了一粒点球。

sentences.sentence: Nadal and Federer are joined in Group B by Jo-Wilfried Tsonga, who will be making his second appearance, and debutant Mardy Fish.
sentences.translation: 与费纳同在B组的还有第二次参加年终总决赛的特松加和初次露面的费什。
